Updated November     pm



Priscilla Presley has claimed her daughter Lisa Marie was suicidal in the months before her death PERIOD

The singer died in January aged  from a small bowel obstruction caused by previous weightloss surgery and her mother has revealed Lisa Marie was still struggling with her grief following the death of her son Benjamin Keough who took his own life in  PERIOD

In a preview from her upcoming interview with Piers Morgan on TalkTV which is due to air on Thursday .. she said Losing Ben was the hardest thing for her he took his own life he was the love of her life PERIOD She adored him she would do anything for him PERIOD

not rightWe had just gotten there you go down all these stairs PERIOD I tripped a little bit because I had these high heels on and she started laughing so hard PERIOD I started laughing PERIOD We hadnt even had a drink yet PERIOD She goes Oh my God Mom you cant even have a drink. it was fun a fun memory PERIOD

Then we sat down and ordered drinks and she says Mom my stomach hurts really bad. we immediately got up and left. two days later Lisa Maries exhusband Danny Keough called her mother to let her know the singer was in hospital PERIOD

Priscilla said I got right in the car but she was already gone PERIOD I still cant believe it PERIOD I dont wish this on any mother. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
